Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       As the shots bhurst apon Megatron, he sailed back into a nearby tree. 
His left eye began to stream mech down his face in a terible sting. He rolled 
forward and took a spot of cover. Thinking a moment, he rose to face Killfest 
and blasted 5 concussion missles at the bot. 
      

       Tankkor spins away from Endbringers shots, the ones that do come into 
contact slam into his armored backside. He thuds closer to Endbriger, held 
out his right arm, and in the upper section a small compartment flies open 
and shoots out a large electricaly charged net at Endbringer.
       Meanwhile, Marine see's Endbringer, and, from behinde, sends three 
large missles sailing for his large knee caps.

       Akron plummits for a few moments from the shots, then flips up and 
sends his fist in a course for Scyther's jaw. Once there, not only would he 
break it, but he would drain some of the bots energy.

       Tarantulas, still in vhicle mode, races around the battle scene. His 
left back tire explodes from Greven. Once transformed he takes out his chain 
gun and a round of twenty shots of him. And, to top it off, he sends another 
batch of cluster missles at the bot.
*** Note: If you remember, Cluster Missles are small missles shot from 
Tarantulas' shoulders. A batch contains four of these such missles. ***
       Aerostreak, soaring above with a broken leg, see's Greven and spirals 
two optic blasts down on the bot.

       Putnam sees Goldeneye fall and wraps his hands around the females 
throat, sending a shockwave of energon energy through her.

       Jackle see's Drillbit's gatling gun. He races and leaps apon the guns 
barrle, and with one extended arm, shoots at Drillbits head, holding on 
tightly as the barrle swings violently. Gremlin takes out a large shotgun, 
aims for Drillbit, and sends a ripping blast at the bots left side.

       Pheniox swoops down on Dollen, her wrists extended, sending two steams 
of fire balls at the bot from above. Nighteyes, seeing Dollen, takes out an 
genade and tosses it at Dollen.

       Odiphious and Venus, both with Darkmouse locked as a target, fire 
thier pistols at her from the ground. Venus takes out a long energon binding 
rope, ties it into a lasso, and swirls it above her head.....as the bot fell 
closer to the earth Venus was going to snag Darkmouse. Meanwhile, Odiphus 
continues to assult her.



--part1_f7.63fed15.2784c056_boundary
